content.description: Sit Start with a heel hook to the far right of the front of the boulder, next to the tree on the right.   Traverse left, and topping out on the blocky ending, next to the tree on the left of the block. use of the far knob to help top out is recommended.
content.location: this lip traverse faces the road, and goes from the left to the right.

content.description: Sit start with a heel hook and traverse right. end when you reach the incut rail on top. the incut will be near the far right of the boulders side.   Top out with the help of the incut.
content.location: This traverse is located on the right side of this block, facing to the right, away from the road. The problem traversed left to the right.

content.description:
Probably not worth your time unless you have done everything else in the area. Even then you may not want to do this one. 

  This Block is to the right of the Roadside boulder, and can also be seen clearly from where you park.   It is a very low disc type boulder. Small. And can only be traversed along the lip, or possibly used to practice mantles on... but here will only list the lip traverse problems.
